#summary A simple object-relational mapper for the Google Gears database

To run this example you need to install [http://gears.google.com/ Google Gears]

This example will run the test suite of the example and then display a class browser. This class browser shows the contents of the underlying tables for those classes that represent a table.

To tun the example [http://it.test.avantaxx.de/xssinterface/projects/Joose/examples/simple_orm.html clieck here]
